decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay using a mix of creatures, spells, and lands from the Golgari color combination. The key strategy involves quickly building a board presence with efficient creatures like Tyvar, Jubilant Brawler and Overlord of the Balemurk, supported by mana acceleration from cards like Llanowar Elves. Insidious Roots and Osteomancer Adept provide additional utility and disruption. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with early threats and efficient removal, maintaining pressure throughout the game. The combination of creatures, removal, and mana acceleration allows for fast-paced and powerful gameplay.

This Orzhov Control deck focuses on disrupting your opponent's strategy through a combination of removal spells, life gain, and hand disruption. By controlling the board with cards like Ancient Vendetta and Legions to Ashes, and gaining life with Authority of the Consuls and Mazemind Tome, you can outlast your opponent and secure victory. The deck also includes cards like Cease / Desist and Deadly Cover-Up to counter your opponent's spells, ensuring that you maintain control of the game throughout. With a mix of removal, disruption, and life gain, this deck aims to outlast and outmaneuver your opponent.
